cast.overview: Ethan Hunt and team continue their search for the terrifying AI known as the Entity — which has infiltrated intelligence networks all over the globe — with the world's governments and a mysterious ghost from Hunt's past on their trail. Joined by new allies and armed with the means to shut the Entity down for good, Hunt is in a race against time to prevent the world as we know it from changing forever.
cast.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning

crew.overview: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.
crew.title: Little Women

details.biography: Sam Lilja is a Juilliard-trained American expat living in London. He has worked on theatrical productions and on film and TV sets around the world. Recent favourites include Zooming with Simon Pegg during the depths of the pandemic, jamming with the cast of Greta Gerwig’s Little Women, entering the Upside Down with the cast of Stranger Things: The First Shadow, and sailing on the ocean with the cast of the live-action remake of Moana. He loves any kind of fermented food.
details.name: Sam Lilja
